thread.title: Industrial Development of India

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Industrial Development of India
text: 'THE Servants of India Society' started by the late Mr. Gokhale is not merely concerned with political and social work-as it is doing so far-but it also has as one of its objects 'helping forward the industrial development of the country.' Owing to certain startling facts which have brought to light India's utter helplessness, two or three members of the society are now busy collecting opinions with regard to the necessity of a "Bureau of Economic and Industrial Information." They are writing to experts on the matter throughout India. The following are the main objects of the newly proposed bureau. (a)To promote the economic and industrial interests of the Indian people, (b) to gather and disseminate all kinds of Industrial and economic information (c) to focus the views of experts on economic and industrial questions.
